1.content: Research and acquire comprehensive UK street database sources
1.details:
1. Investigate Ordnance Survey AddressBase datasets
2. Explore Royal Mail PAF licensing requirements
3. Assess OpenStreetMap UK street data completeness
4. Evaluate government open data sources (ONS, GOV.UK)
5. Analyze data licensing costs and requirements
6. Document data coverage and quality assessment

2.content: Design street-level database schema and administrative data integration
2.details:
1. Create streets table with required fields (name, postal_code, coordinates, etc.)
2. Integrate with existing postal_districts, counties, and local_authorities tables
3. Design geographic boundary relationships (counties, LGAs, regions)
4. Plan street-to-administrative area mapping logic
5. Design message board system schema (posts, users, moderation)
6. Create indexes for optimal query performance

3.content: Develop street data processing and import pipeline
3.details:
1. Create scripts to process raw street data from chosen sources
2. Implement geographic coordinate parsing and validation
3. Build administrative boundary lookup system
4. Create batch processing for millions of street records
5. Implement duplicate detection and data quality checks
6. Build import progress tracking and error handling

4.details:
1. Create dynamic street page templates with SEO optimization
2. Implement street information display (name, location, admin data)
3. Build coordinate-based mapping integration
4. Create street search and discovery functionality
5. Implement URL routing for individual street pages
6. Add structured data markup for search engines

5.content: Develop message board functionality for each street
5.details:
1. Design user authentication and account system
2. Create post/thread system for street discussions
3. Implement moderation tools and spam prevention
4. Build user profiles and posting history
5. Add notifications and subscription features
6. Create mobile-responsive message interface

6.content: Implement advanced search and discovery features
6.details:
1. Build full-text search across street names and localities
2. Create geographic search (radius, bounding box)
3. Implement filter by administrative areas (counties, LGAs)
4. Add autocomplete and suggestion features
5. Create related streets recommendations
6. Build analytics and trending streets dashboard

7.details:
1. Implement database query optimization for millions of records
2. Create caching strategies for frequently accessed streets
3. Design CDN strategy for static assets and street pages
4. Plan horizontal scaling for high traffic
5. Implement monitoring and performance metrics
6. Create backup and disaster recovery procedures
